propDescriptions.classes: Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See CSS API below for more details.
propDescriptions.className: className applied to the root element.
propDescriptions.displayIcon: The icon to display next to the tree node's label. Either a parent or end icon.
propDescriptions.expansionIcon: The icon to display next to the tree node's label. Either an expansion or collapse icon.
propDescriptions.icon: The icon to display next to the tree node's label.
propDescriptions.label: The tree node label.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.

iconContainer.nodeName: the tree node icon and collapse/expand icon
